game.name: Trauma Pets
game.shortDescription: Trauma Pets is a videogame about managing a newly found race of violent critters however you'd like. Don't let moral qualms distract you from reaching the top of the food chain.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Trauma Pets is a videogame about managing a newly found race of violent critters however you'd like. Don't let moral qualms distract you from reaching the top of the food chain.
